Title: The Soviet water conservancy expert Comrade Bukefu helps us to bring the Huai River under control
Publisher: Shandong renmin chubanshe (山东人民出版社)
Notes: The name of the Soviet expert 'Bukefu' is Bukov. He was present at the construction of the Sanhe floodgate, regulating the water level of Hongze Lake, which acts as a reservoir for the Huai river.
